remarks: Properties of a pair of functions to be a trail between two given vertices(in an undirected graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Nov-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement: istrlon $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( F e. W /\ P e. Z ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) -> ( F ( A ( V TrailOn E ) B ) P <-> ( F ( A ( V WalkOn E ) B ) P /\ F ( V Trails E ) P ) ) ) $.
